00087     enum EdgeBuildingStep {
00089         INIT_REJECT_CONNECTIONS,
00091         INIT,
00093         EDGE2EDGES,
00095         LANES2EDGES,
00097         LANES2LANES_RECHECK,
00099         LANES2LANES_DONE,
00101         LANES2LANES_USER
00102     };

01185     struct TLSDisabledConnection {
01186         int fromLane;

01197 
01198 public:
01202     class tls_disable_finder {
01203     public:
01205         tls_disable_finder(const TLSDisabledConnection& tpl) : myDefinition(tpl) { }
01206 
01207         bool operator()(const TLSDisabledConnection& e) const {
01208             if (e.to != myDefinition.to) {
01209                 return false;
01210             }
01211             if (e.fromLane != myDefinition.fromLane) {
01212                 return false;
01213             }
01214             if (e.toLane != myDefinition.toLane) {
01215                 return false;
01216             }
01217             return true;
01218         }
01219 
01220     private:
01221         TLSDisabledConnection myDefinition;
01222 
01223     private:
01225         tls_disable_finder& operator=(const tls_disable_finder& s);
01226 
01227     };
01228

01234     class connections_toedge_finder {
01235     public:
01237         connections_toedge_finder(NBEdge* const edge2find) : myEdge2Find(edge2find) { }
01238 
01239         bool operator()(const Connection& c) const {
01240             return c.toEdge == myEdge2Find;
01241         }
01242 
01243     private:
01244         NBEdge* const myEdge2Find;
01245 
01246     private:
01248         connections_toedge_finder& operator=(const connections_toedge_finder& s);
01249 
01250     };
01251 
01255     class connections_toedgelane_finder {
01256     public:
01258         connections_toedgelane_finder(NBEdge* const edge2find, int lane2find) : myEdge2Find(edge2find), myLane2Find(lane2find) { }
01259 
01260         bool operator()(const Connection& c) const {
01261             return c.toEdge == myEdge2Find && c.toLane == myLane2Find;
01262         }
01263 
01264     private:
01265         NBEdge* const myEdge2Find;
01266         int myLane2Find;
01267 
01268     private:
01270         connections_toedgelane_finder& operator=(const connections_toedgelane_finder& s);
01271 
01272     };

01274 
01278     class connections_finder {
01279     public:
01281         connections_finder(int fromLane, NBEdge* const edge2find, int lane2find) : myFromLane(fromLane), myEdge2Find(edge2find), myLane2Find(lane2find) { }
01282 
01283         bool operator()(const Connection& c) const {
01284             return c.fromLane == myFromLane && c.toEdge == myEdge2Find && c.toLane == myLane2Find;
01285         }
01286 
01287     private:
01288         int myFromLane;
01289         NBEdge* const myEdge2Find;
01290         int myLane2Find;
01291 
01292     private:
01294         connections_finder& operator=(const connections_finder& s);
01295 
01296     };
01297 
01301     class connections_fromlane_finder {
01302     public:
01304         connections_fromlane_finder(int lane2find) : myLane2Find(lane2find) { }
01305 
01306         bool operator()(const Connection& c) const {
01307             return c.fromLane == myLane2Find;
01308         }
01309 
01310     private:
01311         int myLane2Find;
01312 
01313     private:
01315         connections_fromlane_finder& operator=(const connections_fromlane_finder& s);
01316 
01317     };
01318 
01322     static bool connections_sorter(const Connection& c1, const Connection& c2) {
01323         if (c1.fromLane != c2.fromLane) {
01324             return c1.fromLane < c2.fromLane;
01325         }
01326         if (c1.toEdge != c2.toEdge) {
01327             return c1.toEdge->getID().compare(c1.toEdge->getID()) < 0;
01328         }
01329         return c1.toLane < c2.toLane;
01330     }
01331 
01336     class connections_relative_edgelane_sorter {
01337     public:
01339         explicit connections_relative_edgelane_sorter(NBEdge* e, NBNode* n)
01340             : myEdge(e), myNode(n) {}
01341 
01342     public:
01344         int operator()(const Connection& c1, const Connection& c2) const {
01345             if (c1.toEdge != c2.toEdge) {
01346                 SUMOReal relAngle1 = NBHelpers::normRelAngle(
01347                                          myEdge->getAngle(), c1.toEdge->getAngle());
01348                 SUMOReal relAngle2 = NBHelpers::normRelAngle(
01349                                          myEdge->getAngle(), c2.toEdge->getAngle());
01350                 return relAngle1 > relAngle2;
01351             }
01352             return c1.toLane < c2.toLane;
01353         }
01354 
01355     private:
01357         NBEdge* myEdge;
01358 
01360         NBNode* myNode;
01361 
01362     };
01363 
01364 private:
01366     NBEdge(const NBEdge& s);
01367 
01369     NBEdge& operator=(const NBEdge& s);
01370 
01371 
01372 };
01373 
01374 
01375 #endif
